summary: Fundera is a small business marketplace for financial products and tools. I am working on the first digital finance platform for 20k new business owners, focusing on increasing both engagement and revenue conversion.

Betterment is a digital investment platform that improves customers’ financial lives. I built and led the first design team, helped grow the team from 12–200+, and the customer base from 10,000 to over 250,000.
Design print materials, digital and interactive tools, and branding packages.
Design print materials, e-commerce websites, advertisements and direct mail.
